name: NPR
text:
As a "social circus," Zip Zap aims to foster personal development and positive social change. It's become world-famous along the way — entertaining everyone from Roger Federer to Obama.

"Respect — that's what I've learnt from Zip Zap," says one performer.
https://t.co/wdEzoSfywt

name: NPR
text: With Biden leading in the polls, Democrats are haunted by the ghosts of 2016 when Hillary Clinton led, too. But there are a few key factors that make this year's election different, writes @DomenicoNPR. https://t.co/vJHxyxWuBB
